# idsst.rtutorials

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`idsst.rtutorials` contains the R tutorials

+ boxplots
+ customize
+ data-and-visualization
+ data-wrangling
+ exploratory-data-analysis
+ explore-cat-data
+ histograms
+ line-graphs
+ overplotting
+ programming-basics


## Installation

You can install the development version of idsst.rtutorials from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("hgstp/idsst.rtutorials")
```
